resources.string: About Up Down London for Android
Up Down London for Android was developed by Sam Coles, using the UpDownLondon feed developed by Kirk Northrop, based on an idea by Christiane Link, with an icon designed by Oliver Kay.
For further info, please visit http://www.updownlondon.com
This app is free software licenced under the GPLv3. Code available at https://github.com/SamColes/up-down-london
